Author: chaostheory
Title: While Apple And NBC Squabble Like Girls In A Schoolyard, BitTorrent Keeps On Rolling

Author: michaelneale
Content: Once a day. Given up on reddit and digg. Now its news.YC and Slashdot. I really need to work out a better way to get "local" news - I feel really out of touch at times.

Author: rms
Content: Not at all, PG said in a comment here that they fund undergraduates with take over the world attitudes.

Author: sbraford
Content:
From poster's profile: "Son of a school teacher got his start designing websites. Dropped out of community college freshman year to pursue clothing venture.Failed, started programming with a "Get it done!" mantra.Made first million when he founded xyz game in 2007 at age 20 with partner from Ycombinator. Sold to xyz media two years later for a whopping $1.9 Billion. Devotes time to improving infrastructure in developing nations, Africa."

Seems a bit over the top for y combinator. Hackers are usually very humble people (save bill gates / larry ellison types).
